         Err.. Damn AOL making a send button over a reply button making me 
send a blank email. Now then Dewboy to answer your question. No, I would not. 
As by becoming a council member I would essence be becoming a GM. Everyone 
would get a fair chance whether or not I liked them or didnt like them. 
Although if someone decides to needlessly piss me off about some matter 
within the RPG, such as how when me and you were making all those useless 
OOCs I would give them 3 chances, one warning, a second warning, and then a 
modration, and if they continue to do the same thing again I would set a 
motion to have them booted from the RPG. 

         Also I would also like to let people no my motives for joining the 
council. Although I have been in this RPG a short duration compared to some I 
can see now that the people who participate are really treated like children 
rather than adults. Seriously, no interception of weapons fire? Sure it got 
bad a while back, but you know what people who are on the council should suck 
it up and deal with the problem instead of just making a rule that cuts down 
on gameplay. How could someone do that? Well one could give them a warning if 
they were abusing the weapons fire interception, then if they persisted in 
abusing the thing they could get moderated, and then if they continued, just 
remove them from the RPG as apparently they don't wish to be fair. 

         What would happen to the charachters of the abusive person removed? 
Either A, give them someone, B recruit someone to take them, or C Take 
responsibility for them. Seriously it isnt that hard to control fifty 
charachters I have about three times that in an EZBoard Beast Wars RPG. That 
is because I control all the predacons as noone not even the other GM would 
take any of them and the only other person who did have some has mysteriously 
dissapeared, I control around 3/4ths of the maximals again because the otehr 
GM is lazy, and I also control a whole slew of custom charachters either I 
designed and made or someone else did and are no longer in the RPG.

         Also, I would like to help the RPG finally get off the god damn 
planet Earth and back to Cybertron but not following the Beast Machines story 
line. To me the thing was just too freakishly annoying and I believe only 
some of the later first season was actually good. Earth has been overdone, 
and the storyline this RPG was supposed to follow has been butchered and 
destroyed and looks nothing like the story I saw. And as for more charachters 
popping up from ships? Seriously do you know how unlikely it is that all 
these ships would be hitting the same god damn planet? Who here thinks we 
should move on to something other than past Earth or Earth in Particular?

         Also I find the whole no hostile drone rule ridiculous to even have 
up there. Its BW people undestand there should be no drones at all really. 
And as for offensive ones? Well, They should ask the council first as that 
would be a logical idea. To make things short if im elected for council I am 
going to try to change things Ill try to get RPers treated more as adults 
rather then the imature kids that I feel they are being treated like now. Any 
more questions? Comments?

--part1_28.1e111192.292d179d_boundary

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2 FAMILY="SERIF" FACE="Times New Roman" LANG="0">         Err.. Damn AOL making a send button over a reply button making me send a blank email. Now then Dewboy to answer your question. No, I would not. As by becoming a council member I would essence be becoming a GM. Everyone would get a fair chance whether or not I liked them or didnt like them. Although if someone decides to needlessly piss me off about some matter within the RPG, such as how when me and you were making all those useless OOCs I would give them 3 chances, one warning, a second warning, and then a modration, and if they continue to do the same thing again I would set a motion to have them booted from the RPG. <BR>
<BR>
         Also I would also like to let people no my motives for joining the council. Although I have been in this RPG a short duration compared to some I can see now that the people who participate are really treated like children rather than adults. Seriously, no interception of weapons fire? Sure it got bad a while back, but you know what people who are on the council should suck it up and deal with the problem instead of just making a rule that cuts down on gameplay. How could someone do that? Well one could give them a warning if they were abusing the weapons fire interception, then if they persisted in abusing the thing they could get moderated, and then if they continued, just remove them from the RPG as apparently they don't wish to be fair. <BR>
<BR>
         What would happen to the charachters of the abusive person removed? Either A, give them someone, B recruit someone to take them, or C Take responsibility for them. Seriously it isnt that hard to control fifty charachters I have about three times that in an EZBoard Beast Wars RPG. That is because I control all the predacons as noone not even the other GM would take any of them and the only other person who did have some has mysteriously dissapeared, I control around 3/4ths of the maximals again because the otehr GM is lazy, and I also control a whole slew of custom charachters either I designed and made or someone else did and are no longer in the RPG.<BR>
<BR>
         Also, I would like to help the RPG finally get off the god damn planet Earth and back to Cybertron but not following the Beast Machines story line. To me the thing was just too freakishly annoying and I believe only some of the later first season was actually good. Earth has been overdone, and the storyline this RPG was supposed to follow has been butchered and destroyed and looks nothing like the story I saw. And as for more charachters popping up from ships? Seriously do you know how unlikely it is that all these ships would be hitting the same god damn planet? Who here thinks we should move on to something other than past Earth or Earth in Particular?<BR>
<BR>
         Also I find the whole no hostile drone rule ridiculous to even have up there. Its BW people undestand there should be no drones at all really. And as for offensive ones? Well, They should ask the council first as that would be a logical idea. To make things short if im elected for council I am going to try to change things Ill try to get RPers treated more as adults rather then the imature kids that I feel they are being treated like now. Any more questions? Comments?</FONT></HTML>
